titleStmt.title: The lamentation of the lost sheepe. By G.E.
titleStmt.author: Ellis, G., poet.
Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?
Essex, Robert Devereux, Earl of, 1566-1601.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Iaggard dwelling in Barbycan,

notesStmt.note: Incorporates much of "The passion of a discontented minde", variously attributed to Robert Devereux, Earl of Essex and to Nicholas Breton.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Running title reads: The lost sheepe.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
